item.description:
COME SEE ONE OF THE GREATEST BROADWAY MUSICALS OF ALL TIME!!
"MY FAIR LADY"

My Fair Lady
Book and lyrics by Alan Jay Lerner
Music by Frederick Loewe

Tony Award for Best Musical in 1956 and Best Revival in 1981
Directed by Caitlin Lowans
Featuring Robyn Elizabeth Lee & Timothy John Smith
April 8â€”May 2, 2010


Through my employer, I have access to reduced tickets for this season's performances at The Stoneham Theatre, a beautifully restored former movie theatre in Stoneham Square, located conveniently off both Rt. 93 and Rt. 95 (128).

The theatre has set aside great center Orchestra seats for our group.
Performance is 2.5 hours, which includes intermission.

Afterwards, those who wish can join together for dinner at nearby "Polcari's Restaurant" featuring delectable Italian meals, as well as famous Regina Pizza! Dinner will be posted as a separate meetup.

Choose theatre plus dinner, theatre only, or dinner only.

To purchase tickets for the play, you must call and pay for your ticket using a Credit or Debit Card. Tickets will be available for pickup at the "will call" window in the lobby before curtain time.

Contact Carol Dempsey 781-279-7885 ext. 105, to pay for your ticket. Mention that you are with "Jill's group" in order to get your discount.

Tickets must be paid for by Weds. April 28th.

Note: this event is also posted with The Northern Middlesex Singles Meetup, Meeting and Greeting in Southern NH, and the Boston/Providence Single Parents meetup groups.

http://stonehamtheatr....

STONEHAMTHEATRE.ORG
Stoneham Theatre
395 Main St.
Stoneham, MA. 02180
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Lobby of theatre by 3:45pm

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: My Fair Lady- Musical Theatre (and optional dinner) in the Suburbs! (Adults)
